channel.title: Friendly NPCS? wtf!
channel.description:
I have a problem here,
for some reason, i cannot attack rabbits(lvl2), dwarves(lvl17), but i can attack zombies(lvl13), i kinda figured that these must be friendly of nature, making me unable to attack.
Heres a report of what happens, Whatever weapon i'm wielding, i click the npc, and attack it. I walk up to it, the player stops, and then nothing. If i attack a zombie however, i either approach or stay at distance, depending on attack type, weapon type, and i start attacking.
Any ideas of how to fix this? Its really a thorn in my eye right now. Rep++ Wink

item.title: Friendly NPCS? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

Yeah and how to…?

You’re now practicly telling me, it doesnt work eh? well, fix it.
My question, however was, HOW do i fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Friendly NPCS? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @JavaGuru JavaGuru™
item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

Just make those npc’s the same way as the zombie’s find the zombie’s code and edit it for the rabbits and dwarves.

Read full topic
